speaker: Nightmare Spell System
line: [You have slain a dormant beast, Mountain King's Larva.]

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny fell to his knees, breathless, body broken yet exhilarated. No Memory appeared, only pain and cold.

speaker: Sunny
line: Three seconds. You can rest for three more seconds.

speaker: Narrator
line: The larva’s corpse still chained them. Shifty and Scholar untangled links while chaos raged further away.

speaker: Narrator
line: Several maimed bodies began to move. Four more larvae rose, fangs glistening.

speaker: Sunny
line: Come at me, you bastard!

speaker: Narrator
line: A larva lunged — but a sword flashed, beheading it in one strike.

speaker: Sunny
line: He is. Awesome… Poser! I mean he's a poser!

speaker: Narrator
line: The young soldier fought on, then threw something to Sunny.

speaker: Young Soldier
line: Save yourself!

speaker: Narrator
line: It was a bent iron rod. A key to the shackles.

speaker: Sunny
line: It's the key to the shackles!

speaker: Narrator
line: With a click, Sunny was free. He rubbed his wrists, eyes gleaming with dark intent.

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: Ah! Free at last! Gods must be smiling upon us!

speaker: Gentle Slave (Scholar)
line: Thank you…

speaker: Narrator
line: The third larva died under the soldier’s blade. Shifty and Scholar argued over fleeing.

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: If you say 'advise' again, I swear I'll bash your head open!

speaker: Gentle Slave (Scholar)
line: If we run away, we will surely die. Without the fire, we’ll freeze before dawn.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny knew Scholar was right. The mountain itself was deadlier than hunger or chains.

speaker: Sunny
line: Let's go take a look.

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: Are you insane? You want to get closer to that beast?!
